disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Crystal Spires.

blurb.value: Skarner's presence causes crystals to spawn in set locations around the map. While near crystals his team owns, Skarner gains tremendous movement speed, attack speed, and mana regeneration.

description.value: Innate: Skarner's presence causes 6 Crystal Spires to appear at set points on the battlefield: One beside Baron Nashor's pit One beside Dragon's pit One nearby each buff monster's camp

description2.value: Crystal Spires can be captured by champions after minions have spawned by standing near them for 2 seconds. Once captured, Crystal Spires are owned until contested and the defending team can stand on the spire to prevent the opposing team from capturing it.

description3.value: Crystal Spires grant 30 gold split among its captors upon being captured, or 15 gold if only a single champion participated in its capture, and provide sight around them for 1.5 seconds upon being captured, becoming unable to be recaptured for 15 seconds.

description4.value: Skarner gains Crystal Charge while within range of a Crystal Spire controlled by his team, for 1.25 seconds after triggering Crystal Venom, or for 1.75 seconds after stinging an enemy champion with Impale.

description5.value: Crystal Charge: Skarner gains 70 − 120 (based on level)  bonus movement speed, 43% − 160% (based on level)  bonus attack speed and restores  1% maximum mana every 0.5 seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Crystal Charge's duration refreshes if it was gained by an ability.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Crystal Slash.

effect radius.value: 350

blurb.value: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage.

description.value: Active: Skarner slashes around himself, dealing physical damage to all surrounding enemies.

leveling.value: Physical Damage:1 / 1.5 / 2 / 2.5 / 3% of target's maximum health (+ 20% AD)

description2.value: If an enemy is hit, subsequent uses of Crystal Slash within 5 seconds deal bonus magic damage.

leveling2.value: Bonus Magic Damage:»1 / 1.5 / 2 / 2.5 / 3% of target's maximum health (+ 20% AD) (+ 30% AP)«Total Mixed Damage:2 / 3 / 4 / 5 / 6% of target's maximum health (+ 40% AD) (+ 30% AP)

description3.value: Basic attacks against non-structures reduce Crystal Slash's  cooldown by 0.25 seconds, quadrupled to 1 against enemy champions.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

damagetype.value: Physical damage / Magic damage

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Spell shield will block the damage but will not prevent Skarner from triggering the bonus effect.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Crystalline Exoskeleton.

blurb.value: Skarner gains a shield and has increased Movement Speed while the shield persists.

description.value: Active: Skarner crystallizes himself, gaining a shield for up to 6 seconds and initial  bonus movement speed that accelerates by 100% over 3 seconds while the shield holds.

leveling.value: Shield Strength:10 / 11 / 12 / 13 / 14% maximum health (+ 80% AP)Initial Bonus Movement Speed:»8 / 10 / 12 / 14 / 16%«Maximum Bonus Movement Speed:16 / 20 / 24 / 28 / 32%

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Fracture.

target range.value: 1000

width.value: 140

blurb.value: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them. Basic attacking these enemies within a short window will stun them.

description.value: Passive: Every time Skarner triggers Crystal Venom or stings an enemy with Impale, Fracture's  cooldown is reduced by the corresponding base duration of the disable.

description2.value: Active: Skarner launches a blast of crystalline energy in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies struck and slowing them for 2.5 seconds, as well as marking them with Crystal Venom for 5 seconds.

description3.value: Skarner's next basic attack against a target marked with Crystal Venom consumes the mark to deal them bonus physical damage and stun them for 1.25 seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

damagetype.value: Magic damage / Physical damage

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Fracture is disabled during Impale. Fracture is always cast from the original casting location. Crystal Venom triggers even if the attack is blocked ( stun applies), but not if it's dodged. The damage of the entire attack is negated in both cases. PENDING FOR TEST: Blind.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Impale.

target range.value: 350

blurb.value: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion and deals damage to it. During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, the target will be dealt additional damage.

description.value: Active: Skarner roots the target enemy champion during the ability's cast time and attempts to impale them with his stinger. Upon successfully impaling the target, he deals them 60% AD physical damage and bonus magic damage, and reveals and suppresses them for 1.75 seconds, during which he can drag his victim with himself. At the end of the duration, the target takes the same damage again.

leveling.value: Bonus Magic Damage:»20 / 40 / 60 / 80 / 100  (+ 50% AP)«Total Mixed Damage:40 / 80 / 120 / 160 / 200  (+ 120% AD) (+ 100% AP)

description2.value: Impale pierces through displacement immunity, dragging them out.*

description3.value: During the ability Skarner is locked out from basic attacking, casting Fracture, or using Flash.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

damagetype.value: Physical / Magic

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The target will not take Impale's secondary damage if the suppression is removed. If the target becomes untargetable, dies, Skarner loses sight of them, or they move 800 units away from him during the cast time, Impale cancels but does not go on  cooldown nor consume  mana. Spell shield will not block the root. Impale is special cased to end prematurely if the target is affected by Devour, both for an ally and enemy Tahm Kench or if Skarner is teleported by Realm Warp. Impale applies a small displacement to the target every 0.25 seconds whenever they are not close to Skarner. These displacements do not apply airborne and are not flagged as displacements, meaning that targets who are not immune to the suppression are also never immune to the displacement, either. As a consequence, displacement immunity fails to ignore this movement. See the table below. While Impale is active, and for the purposes of direction-conditioned abilities, (e.g. Petrifying Gaze, Mocking Shout) Skarner is considered to be facing in the direction he is moving and not the one his model is facing. Special interactions The following dashes are interrupted and do not apply their 'on dash completion' effects (if they have one) when successfully impaled: Corki's Special Delivery Nocturne's Paranoia's recast Sett's The Show Stopper This ability attaches its target to Sett. Dragging him out will detach that unit from him. Shyvana's Dragon's Descent Yone's Soul Unbound (recast) Yone's very high dash speed makes it almost impossible to catch him during the dash. Skarner is required to be close enough to Yone and needs to have near-perfect timing with Impale's cast in order to successfully cancel the dash. If cast too early, the recast will be deferred to the end of Impale's duration, or if cast too late, Impale will be canceled as Yone is already too far away. The following dashes are stopped likewise with the ones mentioned above, however, they do apply 'on dash completion' effects and when their dash is interrupted, the ability's effects are centered around their initial stopping point from Impale. Hecarim's Onslaught of Shadows Jarvan IV's Cataclysm The terrain that would usually be formed on impact is instead delayed until the forced movement of Impale ends. The displacement immunity is not removed (he still cannot resist Impale's displacement despite of this). Malphite's Unstoppable Force The following abilities do not have any special interactions with Impale other than being displaced during their cast. Illaoi's Leap of Faith Ornn's Bellows Breath The cast direction for this ability cannot be changed. Rek'Sai's Void Rush has two different outcomes: Impale is cast before the burrow into the ground: Rek'Sai will not vanish while she's being dragged and her ultimate goes on a 10-second  cooldown after a brief delay. The displacement immunity is not removed (she still cannot resist Impale's displacement despite of this) in this case however, which ends when the ability cancels. Impale is cast after the emergence: Rek'Sai's dash is interrupted. Vi's Assault and Battery behaves differently in contrast to the previously noted examples due to its uniqueness. The dash is not interrupted and the displacement immunity is not removed (she still cannot resist Impale's displacement despite of this). Vi will continue to march towards the target while simultaneously being displaced by Impale and dragged to Skarner. Once Impale ends, she is free of the displacement and will perform the ability as normal. Enemies that come into range of her are still affected by entering her path. The primary target is dealt the ability's final effects if they move into the respective range of Vi, thus performing the ability successfully in spite of Impale. Camille's The Hextech Ultimatum is impractical to test, as it renders her untargetable instantly the moment it's activated, which will always cancel Impale's cast, regardless of the timing. Kalista's Fate's Call is not possible to test due to the target being vanished, rendering them unable to be selected for unit-targeted abilities like Impale.
notes.description: The following dashes are interrupted and do not apply their 'on dash completion' effects (if they have one) when successfully impaled: Corki's Special Delivery Nocturne's Paranoia's recast Sett's The Show Stopper This ability attaches its target to Sett. Dragging him out will detach that unit from him. Shyvana's Dragon's Descent Yone's Soul Unbound (recast) Yone's very high dash speed makes it almost impossible to catch him during the dash. Skarner is required to be close enough to Yone and needs to have near-perfect timing with Impale's cast in order to successfully cancel the dash. If cast too early, the recast will be deferred to the end of Impale's duration, or if cast too late, Impale will be canceled as Yone is already too far away.
